paragraphs.text: Hollywood loves Obama, but does Obama love it back?
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Hollywood loves Barack Obama
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it has expressed this in every way it knows how, from celebrity endorsements and campaign appearances to huge donations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the 2012 presidential race, show biz folks gave Obama more than six million dollars, five times as much as Romney got
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: It has even been announced that a biopic of Obama's first date with Michelle--dinner and a Spike Lee movie--is on the way
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Without spoiling the plot I can reveal that it has a happy ending
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So Hollywood loves Obama
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: not surprisingly, Obama loves it right back
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he is an admirer of its role in the world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: "Believe it or not, entertainment is part of our American diplomacy," Obama told an A-list gathering of movie stars and film executives at DreamWorks, in November 2013
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: "It is part of what makes us exceptional, part of what makes us such a world power
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Hundreds of millions of people may never set foot in the United States, but thanks to you, they've experienced a small part of what makes our country special
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: They've learned something about our values
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: We have shaped a world culture through you...in a way that has made the world better."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: This is what is known as a matter of opinion
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: A dissenting view is held by hundreds of millions of Muslims who consider the incursions of the American cinema to be a dangerous and despicable form of Zionist-Crusader cultural imperialism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Obama's speech to Hollywood will not disabuse them of this belief
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: ".[Foreigners] might not know the Gettysburg Address," Obama said
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: "but if they're watching some old movie, maybe "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner," or "The Mary Tyler Moore Show," or "Will and Grace" and "Modern Family," they've had a front-row seat to our march towards progress, even if their own nations haven't made that progress yet
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: And young people in countries all around the world suddenly make a connection and have an affinity to people who look don't like them and maybe originally they might have been fearful of, and now suddenly they say, oh, this person is like me -- which is one of the powers of art
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: that's what you transmit."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: It would be comforting to think that the president was simply flattering his audience
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he actually believes this
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: his lack of sophistication about the Middle East makes George W  Bush look like Lawrence of Arabia
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: "Mary Tyler Moore"?
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Women aren't even allowed to drive in Saudi Arabia
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are forced to wear "modest" clothing down to their ankles in Iran
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In most of the region, a woman who disobeys her husband or talks back to him faces a beating at best, usually with the hearty approval of the wife's family father and brothers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: "Will and Grace"?
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Homosexuality is a capital crime throughout most of the Arab world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: because it is seen as an offense against Allah and the family
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The only gay bars in the Arab world and Iran are on the windows of prison cells
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner"?
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: A Muslim girl crazy enough to bring home an infidel fiance is inviting a sequel: "Guess Who's Having a Funeral"?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Parents, clergy and community elders in the Middle East are not entertained, let alone edified, by Hollywood values
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are horrified by what they see as a godless foreign assault on their children, their religion and their way of life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In most places even G-rated films are considered transgressive
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They can be found mostly via under-the-counter bootleggers or downloaded in secret
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And they are
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Their impact on young people is not the liberation Obama imagines
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: however
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Unmarried men do not have unfettered access to members of the opposite sex
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: many find explicit depictions to be frustrating and humiliating
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In some, they even inspire a militant puritanical Islam that makes posthumous sex the ultimate reward for killing infidels
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Unmarried young women, lacking even that outlet, need to be careful and obedient to the code of conduct
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A girl caught trying to emulate the tamest teenage movie role model puts her life in danger
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: My point is not that Hollywood is wrong to make movies and television shows that reflect American social values and suit the American audience
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And I certainly don't expect the president to inform his biggest boosters that their creations ignite resentment, hostility and holy war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I do hope, though, that the president and his advisers understand this:"Will and Grace," "Mary Tyler Moore" and even the new Obama biopic may win Oscars and Emmys, but in a struggle for hearts and minds in a region where cutting- edge refers to swords, not cinema, Hollywood is not a strategic American asset
paragraphs.label: assumption
